text:
Created attachment 33215
This patch improves the static initialization.

JspFactoryImpl has inefficient static initialization:

'Boolean.parseBoolean(s)' is more efficient than 'Boolean.valueOf(s).booleanValue()'

'Integer.parseInt(s)' is more efficient than 'Integer.valueOf(s).intValue()'
creator: anthony@whitford.com

text: Fixed in trunk, 8.0.x (for 8.0.29 onwards) and 7.0.x (for 7.0.66 onwards).
creator: markt@apache.org
